sys_script_include.name: TraktOAuthInitiation

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_3b909a0f47b2021057c9cbb9316d4378
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.TraktOAuthInitiation</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>TraktOAuthInitiation</name><script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    // Parameters for constructing the authorization URL
    var clientId = '83108f35754423241f7f694af40f4e00add45520862ee3877825c127f1c9d798';
    var redirectUri = 'https://dev212312.service-now.com/api/1126673/trakt_api/oauth_redirect_do';
    var responseType = 'code'; // OAuth Authorization Code flow

    // Construct the authorization URL
    var authorizationUrl = 'https://trakt.tv/oauth/authorize'
        + '?response_type=' + encodeURIComponent(responseType)
        + '&client_id=' + encodeURIComponent(clientId)
        + '&redirect_uri=' + encodeURIComponent(redirectUri);

    // Redirect to the constructed authorization URL
    response.sendRedirect(authorizationUrl);
})(request, response);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-19 15:35:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>3b909a0f47b2021057c9cbb9316d4378</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TraktOAuthInitiation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Show recommendations" source="9800e6e247e2021057c9cbb9316d43b6">9800e6e247e2021057c9cbb9316d43b6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Show recommendations">9800e6e247e2021057c9cbb9316d43b6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3b909a0f47b2021057c9cbb9316d4378</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-19 15:35:18</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
